thread.title: Protecting Virunga Park and seeing Congo's rich potential
thread.title_full: Video: Protecting Virunga Park and seeing Congo's rich potential | Watch PBS NewsHour Online | PBS Video

author: pbs.org
title: Protecting Virunga Park and seeing Congo's rich potential
text: Emmanuel de Merode -- anthropologist, Belgian prince and chief warden of the Virunga National Park -- has dedicated his life to the rich wildlife found within the precious and contentious national park in the Democratic Republic of Congo. That has meant actually risking his life; more than 100 of his rangers have died. He joins contributing editor Soledad O’Brien to discuss Congo’s future.
